description: Try our easy to follow Vegetarian Rissoles recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Rissoles,Pescatarian,Zucchini,Halal,High protein,Seafood free,Vegetarian,Tree nut free,Peanut free
name: Vegetarian Rissoles Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Process bread in a food processor until breadcrumbs form (you will need 2 cups). Transfer to a large bowl. Add chickpeas, carrot and zucchini to food processor. Process until finely chopped and well combined. Transfer to bowl with breadcrumbs. Add shallots, cheese and egg. Season with salt and pepper, if desired.
Form mixture into 8 patties. Lightly coat each in plain flour.

Heat a non-stick frying pan over a medium heat. Add 2 tablespoon of oil. Add 4 rissoles and cook for 3 minutes on each side or until light golden and heated through. Transfer to a large plate. Cover with foil to keep warm. Cook remaining rissoles.
Serve rissoles with tomato chutney and vegetables or green salad if desired.
